T02D2637:207b-1: sarba du rga ti pa ri sho dha na ma

T02D2637:207b-3: skad du / ngan song thams cad yongs su sbyong
T02D2637:207b-4: ba'i ro'i sbyin sreg gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga

T02D2637:207b-6: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngan song thams cad yongs

T02D2637:207b-9: rgyal sras lhag ma dang ni rigs kyi yum rnams dang //
T02D2637:207b-10: phyi nang lha mo sgo skyong bcas pa la //

T02D2637:207b-12: rtsa ba'i rgyud las btus nas su //
T02D2637:207b-13: ngan song thams cad sbyong mdzad pa'i //

T02D2637:207b-15: sangs rgyas gsang ba'i rim pa la //
T02D2637:207b-16: brten te bdag gis bshad par bya //
T02D2637:207b-17: dang por bla ma rin po che mnyes par byas nas /

T02D2637:208a-2: spyi dang khyad par gyi dam tshig la gnas pas
T02D2637:208a-3: sngar rang gi sgrub thabs kyi rim pas bsnyen pa

T02D2637:208a-5: bdag dang gzhan 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar
T02D2637:208a-6: bya ba'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba la 'jug
T02D2637:208a-7: par bya'o // dkyil 'khor yo byad thams cad bsdus nas su /
T02D2637:208a-8: tshes grangs bzang dang rgyu skar la sogs bzang po dang /
T02D2637:208a-9: dkyil 'khor sa gzhi mtshan ma blta phyir grogs dang bcas pas de nyid brtag bya ste //
T02D2637:208a-10: lha khang tshong dus yul deng grong khyer khyams kyi shar dang byang du brtsam par bya //

T02D2637:208a-15: dkon mchog gsum la phyi nang mchod pa bya zhing
T02D2637:208a-16: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la gtor ma sbyin de

T02D2637:208a-20: dpyid zla gsum la lho ru bltas la brko//
T02D2637:208a-21: dbyar zla gsum la nub tu bltas la brko ste lto bar bsams na /
T02D2637:208a-22: mgo dang rgyab dang 'phong bor ba'o //
T02D2637:208a-23: sa'i ro lnga la sogs pa bsal zhing yang ngo //
T02D2637:208a-24: dri zhim po dang sa bsres pa'am /
T02D2637:208a-25: dri zhim po dang chu bsres pa la h'um bzlas pas bkang la 'thas par bcags la /
T02D2637:208a-26: lag mthil ltar mnyam pa'i steng du gzhal yas khang rgyan dang bcas pa bsam /
T02D2637:208a-27: me tog phreng ba la sogs pa'i rgyan mang po dgong /
T02D2637:208a-28: gtso bo'i bzlas pa byas pa'i sman dang 'bru dang rin po che dbus su gzhag go //
T02D2637:208a-29: zug rngu'i nyes pa thams cad ni //
T02D2637:208a-30: gal te dbyung bar mi nus na //
T02D2637:208a-31: lag pa brdab ste sngags 'di bzlas //
T02D2637:208a-32: dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur //
T02D2637:208a-33: khang chen brag phug ba lang lhas //
T02D2637:208a-34: lha khang la sogs 'bab chu 'gram lngar sbyang mi dgos /
T02D2637:208a-35: rang gtso bor bsgom zhing khro bo'i sngags kyis bgegs
T02D2637:208b-0: bskrad chu dang yungs kar thal ba la bzlas @208b
T02D2637:208b-1: te ba'i rnam lngas byug cing dri'i chab kyis gtor

T02D2637:208b-3: dang rin chen dbus su gzhug / sa dag par
T02D2637:208b-6: // / de nas rnam dag mos pa yis //
T02D2637:208b-7: nang gi khrus kyis dag par bya'o //
T02D2637:208b-8: dang po sngags pa bdag gi ngag / dag par 'dod pas 'di ltar bsam //
T02D2637:208b-9: lce la pam las skyes pa yi //

T02D2637:208b-12: bskyed pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du //

T02D2637:208b-15: rdo rje lce zhes bya ba ste //

T02D2637:208b-17: lag gnyis mthil du zla gnyis bsam //

T02D2637:208b-19: h'um las rdo rje rtse lngar bskyed //
T02D2637:208b-20: shin tu dkar ba lag pa la //

T02D2637:208b-22: phyag rgya gang yin bcing bar bya //
T02D2637:208b-23: rdor dril g-yon blangs lag bzhag ste//
T02D2637:208b-24: rdo rje snying rje byang chub sems //

T02D2637:208b-28: de nas lan gsum gyen 'phyar dkrol //
T02D2637:208b-29: de gnyis gcig gis gcig 'khyud de //
T02D2637:208b-30: rdo rje lan gsum gsor byas te //

T02D2637:208b-32: dril bu'i sgras ni dgyes pa bskyed //
T02D2637:208b-33: de ltar byas na nus pa bskyed //
T02D2637:208b-34: gza' skar sogs dus bzang bya ste //
T02D2637:208b-35: slob dpon rang lha'i rnal 'byor byas //
T02D2637:208b-37: sgrub pa'i rim pas bgegs bskrad de //
T02D2637:208b-38: srung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs par bya //
T02D2637:208b-39: snying ga nas byung dkyil 'khor sprul //
T02D2637:208b-41: nam mkha'i khams su khyab bsams te //

T02D2637:208b-43: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T02D2637:208b-48: las kyi rigs su bzhugs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2637:209a-0: gsang sngags kyi lha'i khyad par thams cad dang bcom ldan 'das kun rig @209a * //
T02D2637:209a-1: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor du
T02D2637:209a-2: bcas pa khyed rnams bdag dang slob mar bcas pa
T02D2637:209a-3: la byin gyis brlab cing bsrung ba'i phyir bzhugs su
T02D2637:209a-5: snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i dbus su bsdus nas gcig tu gyur par bsam /
T02D2637:209a-6: de nas rang lus lha'i nga rgyal byas la langs
T02D2637:209a-7: te mig g-yon ta las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis
T02D2637:209a-8: pa ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'bras bu gnyis
T02D2637:209a-9: la yi ge h'um 'bar ba'i lta bas me ltar
T02D2637:209a-10: 'bar bas rdo rje'i mig aa las sna tshogs rdo
T02D2637:209a-12: rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol /
T02D2637:209a-13: rgyan cha dang ldan gtso bo'i nga rgyal bskyed /
T02D2637:209a-14: rdo rje 'gros kyis bskor ba bya zhing dril gsil rdo rje bskor //
T02D2637:209a-15: bgegs rnams bskrad pa'i phyir ni mgo mig btud la 'di skad brjod /
T02D2637:209a-16: slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che
T02D2637:209a-17: ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya
T02D2637:209a-18: ba'i phyir dang / mtha' yas pa'i sems can thams
T02D2637:209a-19: cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya
T02D2637:209a-20: ba'i phyir sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po

T02D2637:209a-22: ba'i phyir dang / yis lha dang / lha ma yin dang /
T02D2637:209a-33: rig sngags 'chang ba grub pa rgan po dang /

T02D2637:209a-36: de ltar phyag na rdo rje'i bka' thos nas myur
T02D2637:209a-37: du dengs shig / gang dag mi 'gro bar sems
T02D2637:209a-38: pa de dag ni phyag na rdo rje h'um zhes
T02D2637:209a-39: bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can
T02D2637:209a-40: gyis ye shes 'bar ba rab tu rdo rje chen
T02D2637:209a-41: por 'bar bas mgo bo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par

T02D2637:209a-45: g-yas brkyang la sogs pa'i stang stabs skabs 'dir bya'o //
T02D2637:209a-46: gom pa brgyad pa yang bya'o //
T02D2637:209b-0: h'um rgyun @209b mi chad par bya'o //
T02D2637:209b-1: rdo rje dril bu bskor ro //

T02D2637:209b-4: gser gyis gzhi la thug pa'i bar du btab par bsam /
T02D2637:209b-5: aom bee ro tsa na h'um /
T02D2637:209b-6: sarba bighn'an au tsa ya h'um phat /

T02D2637:209b-8: h'um brjod cing nga rgyal bskyed de sngags kyang brjod /
T02D2637:209b-10: nam mkha' la ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2637:209b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gang ba'i nga
T02D2637:209b-12: rgyal bskyed la / grogs po rnams kyis dkyil 'khor
T02D2637:209b-13: bri ba'i phyir bdag nyid la gsol ba btab par
T02D2637:209b-14: rgyal bskyed la / bsam mo // de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02D2637:209b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //

T02D2637:209b-17: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02D2637:209b-18: mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs //

T02D2637:209b-23: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //

T02D2637:209b-25: kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //

T02D2637:209b-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'a da ya bandha nam ka ro mi /
T02D2637:209b-28: zhes pas zhabs la phyag bya'o//

T02D2637:209b-30: langs la nga rgyal bskyed pa 'di brjod do //
T02D2637:209b-31: bdag nyid rang bzhin rdo rje can //
T02D2637:209b-32: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid //
T02D2637:209b-33: bdag ni sangs rgyas rgyal po che //
T02D2637:209b-34: stobs chen rdo rje can bdag yin //
T02D2637:209b-35: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rgyal po bdag / phyag na rdo rje ston bdag ste //
T02D2637:209b-36: bdag po rdo rje chen po bdag / byin gyis brlabs pa mi 'dor ro //
T02D2637:209b-37: de nas rdo rje dril bu blangs la /
T02D2637:209b-39: zhes pas ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i dkyil 'khor nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol /
T02D2637:210a-2: sa gzhi rdo rjer gyur par bsam mo //
T02D2637:210a-3: gzhal yas khang nam mkha' la dmigs la rdo rje'i
T02D2637:210a-4: mig gis bgegs med par mthong nas sgo dbye ba'i
T02D2637:210a-6: sngags pas rdo rje rgyu'i gzugs lto ba che ba
T02D2637:210a-7: dbu bzhi pa phyag bzhi pa rdo rje dang 'khor
T02D2637:210a-8: lo dang padma dang ral gri bsnams pa sku mdog
T02D2637:210a-9: ser po bsgoms te de la 'khor lo btsud la
T02D2637:210a-10: lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas bkug la /

T02D2637:210a-14: par byas / aom ma h'a badzra tsa kra auttishthi biddha h'um /
T02D2637:210a-15: de nas khu tshur gnyis bcings te //
T02D2637:210a-16: 'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar bya //

T02D2637:210a-19: dmar po'i rgyan dang bcas pa'i phur pa lag pa
T02D2637:210a-20: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung la g-yas pas tho

T02D2637:210a-24: phur pa gdab pa'i sngags so //
T02D2637:210a-25: aom badzra mungga ra a'a ko ta ya h'um tho ba'i sngags so //
T02D2637:210a-26: de nas rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgyas bgegs bskrad /
T02D2637:210a-28: gsum gyis phyi rol du 'khor lo dang padma dang
T02D2637:210a-29: rdo rje ra ba dang sa gzhi yang rdo rjer
T02D2637:210a-30: bsam / 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'od dang bcas pa

T02D2637:210a-32: khu tshur gyis sgo bcad par bsam mo //

T02D2637:210a-34: mo sku mdog ser mo bum pa lag na thogs
T02D2637:210a-35: pa rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa /

T02D2637:210a-38: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //

T02D2637:210a-42: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D2637:210a-43: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //

T02D2637:210a-45: rgyal bar bya ste dkyil 'khor bri /
T02D2637:210a-46: sa'i lha mo dga' ba'i mdangs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig zer nas 'og tu thim mo //
T02D2637:210b-0: de nas @210b rdo rje bsdams pa dang sngags 'dis gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2637:210b-3: aom badzra dhi de au ta tishtha /
T02D2637:210b-4: zhes pas byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D2637:210b-5: de nas dri bzang po la sogs pas byugs la /
T02D2637:210b-6: me tog sna tshogs pa chal bar dgram mo //
T02D2637:210b-7: dkyil 'khor du lha rnams ji ltar gnas pa'i ming brjod de mandala re re bya'o //
T02D2637:210b-8: ra ba dang dra ba la sogs pas mtshams bcad nas /
T02D2637:210b-9: rnam par snang mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drangs
T02D2637:210b-10: la zhabs bsil dang zhal bsil dang yon chab dang
T02D2637:210b-11: mchod pa brgyad dang gzhan gyis kyang mchod bstod pa
T02D2637:210b-13: bdag rang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug nas /

T02D2637:210b-15: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor byas la nga

T02D2637:210b-24: deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
T02D2637:210b-25: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
T02D2637:210b-26: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //

T02D2637:210b-29: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //

T02D2637:216b-44: rje kha bzhi pa dang go cha mche ba khu
T02D2637:217a-0: de'i phyi rim gyi gru chad shar lhor smin ma 'degs pa'i tshul @217a * //

T02D2637:217b-28: ra ba dang dra ba bsam /
T02D2637:217b-29: rgyan dang bcas pa lho shar du gzhag / de
T02D2637:217b-30: nas sems dpa' 'am mnyam pa'i skyil krung du 'dug
T02D2637:217b-31: la ; yang bdag med par mos par bya /
T02D2637:217b-34: dbang bskur ba blang go gon /
T02D2637:217b-35: de nas rdo rje 'jigs byed nas rdo rje ri
T02D2637:217b-36: bo'i bar dang ra pa dang dra pa dang bla
T02D2637:217b-37: re dang sa gzhi'i bar du bya'o //

T02D2637:217b-39: mchod pa nyi shus mchod pa dang /
T02D2637:217b-41: rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D2637:217b-42: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba dang /
T02D2637:217b-43: mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D2637:217b-44: lus phul la dge ba bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D2637:217b-45: de'i spyan sngar sdom pa blang ngo //
T02D2637:218a-1: rim pa dang po'i bya ba rdzogs so /
T02D2637:218a-3: // /'di nas mar ni slob dpon gang dag ting nge
T02D2637:218a-4: 'dzin gsum du 'dod de de yang mi 'gal bas
T02D2637:218a-5: / dang po gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas thal mo sbyar la /
T02D2637:218a-6: aom sva bh'a wa bhi shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a wa shuddho& ham /
T02D2637:218a-8: de nas dkyil 'khor rgya yongs su ma chad pa /
T02D2637:218a-9: ri rab gzi mdangs dang ldan pa'i dbus su rdo
T02D2637:218a-10: rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo lta bu
T02D2637:218a-11: cha brgyad du legs par phye ba /

T02D2637:218a-13: po che sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba'i khang pa mthon
T02D2637:218a-14: por 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa
T02D2637:218a-15: chen po ngo mtshar ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T02D2637:218a-16: gzhir gyur pa cig bsams la /
T02D2637:218a-17: ji ltar bsams pa'i 'khor lo'i nang du /
T02D2637:218a-18: seng ge dang glang po che dang rta dang rma
T02D2637:218a-19: bya dang shang shang dang zla ba dang padma ni

T02D2637:218a-22: 'khor lo so so'i gnas su zla pa dang padma'o //

T02D2637:218a-24: tshon du ji ltar bkod pa de de ltar bsam
T02D2637:218a-25: mo // de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa lha'i
T02D2637:218a-26: dkyil 'khor 'di dag gi / kha dog rnam par
T02D2637:218a-27: dbye ba brtag pa ni 'di lta ste rtsa ba'i
T02D2637:218a-28: rgyud kyi dbang du byas pa ni slob dpon dang
T02D2637:218a-29: slob ma'i gdong g-yogs dang stod g-yogs dang smad dkris
T02D2637:218a-30: kyi kha dog las shes par bya ste /
T02D2637:218a-31: de yang rtsa pa'i rgyud 'phags pa de kho na
T02D2637:218a-32: nying bsdus pa las rigs bzhi char gyi kha dog
T02D2637:218a-33: gsungs pa / dmar po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs //
T02D2637:218a-34: ston po rdo rje'i rigs su bshad //
T02D2637:218a-35: dkar po padma'i las byung yin //
T02D2637:218a-36: kha dog thams cad rin chen 'byung //
T02D2637:218a-38: de'i rjes su bsnyags na rigs kyi bdag po yang
T02D2637:218a-39: kha dog de dang 'dra pa nyid du rig par
T02D2637:218a-40: bya'o // yang na kha dog rgyan sngags pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'dir bsam par bya'o //
T02D2637:218a-41: ji srid du kha dog rgyan rnams ji ltar 'dod
T02D2637:218a-42: pa bzhin du bri'o zhes rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs
T02D2637:218a-43: pa'i phyir ro // 'dir ni rdo rje rtse mo'i
T02D2637:218a-44: dbang du byas te de las ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D2637:218a-45: pa'i rigs kyi kha dog rnam par phye ste ji
T02D2637:218b-0: pa'i phyir ro // skad du / sngon po ser po de @218b bzhin dmar //
T02D2637:218b-1: sngo bsangs de dag rigs su bshad //
T02D2637:218b-2: de bzhin rgyal ba'i rigs bzang po //
T02D2637:218b-3: kha dog dkar por rab tu grags //
T02D2637:218b-5: yang gzhung chen po las rgyal ba 'ba' zhig gi
T02D2637:218b-6: kha dog rnam par dbye ba bshad ba ltar bya'o
T02D2637:218b-8: rtag pa'i 'khor lo ser po ste //
T02D2637:218b-10: rin chen dbang gi rab tu sngo //
T02D2637:218b-11: tshe dpag med pa dmar por bya //
T02D2637:218b-12: kha dog sna tshogs rgya chen mchog / ces gsungs so //
T02D2637:218b-13: de bas na de ltar 'dul ba'i skye bo'i dbang
T02D2637:218b-14: gis de dag gis kha dog dang dbyibs du mar
T02D2637:218b-16: de dag gi kha dog khyad par ni so sor nges pa med par rig par bya'o //
T02D2637:218b-17: snam bu bdag po dang 'khor yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2637:218b-18: de nyid yon tan thams cad ldan par bsam pa
T02D2637:218b-19: ni rdul tshon gyi dbang du byas pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2637:218b-20: rgyal ba mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so /
T02D2637:218b-22: // / lha so so'i las sems bskyed ma thag tu
T02D2637:218b-23: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba byang chub sems bskyed
T02D2637:218b-24: pa la sogs pa'i las la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2637:218b-25: las rgyal mchog gi ting nge 'dzin rdzogs so /
T02D2637:218b-27: // / de ltar bsam par byas nas spyan drang par bya ste de la rim pa 'di'o //
T02D2637:218b-28: dang por re zhig lha'i rnal 'byor ji ltar byas
T02D2637:218b-29: pa sngon du byas te rang gi snying gar sna
T02D2637:218b-31: rdo rje bsdu ba'i snying po rdo rje tshig gis brjod cing /
T02D2637:218b-32: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bsnol te dpung mgor bzhag
T02D2637:218b-33: la mdzub mo gnyis lcags khyu ltar byas la rang
T02D2637:218b-34: gi gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis kyis se gol
T02D2637:218b-35: brdab cing / ji ltar bsams pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D2637:218b-36: pa la sogs pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnams bsdu
T02D2637:218b-37: brdab cing / bar bya'o // de la 'di ni rdo rje bsdu ba'i snying po'o //
T02D2637:218b-38: aom badzra sa ma ya dza:h'um bam ho: / zhes brjod do //
T02D2637:218b-39: de nas so so'i bya ba'i rnam par grol ba
T02D2637:218b-40: la mnyam par bzhag pas ji ltar bsams pa rnams
T02D2637:218b-41: ji ltar bsams pa'i mchod pa'i gnas kyi khor khor
T02D2637:218b-42: yug tu bzhugs par bsam mo //
T02D2637:218b-43: de nas ji ltar bsams pa'i gnas kyi shar sgor
T02D2637:218b-44: bltas te rdo rje lcags kyu sgo srung gi las
T02D2637:219a-1: la der yang lcags kyu bsams la /
T02D2637:219a-2: aom badzra aam ku sha dza:/
T02D2637:219a-3: zhes bya ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu'i snying po brjod
T02D2637:219a-4: cing dgug pa'i tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa la
T02D2637:219a-5: sogs pa rang rang gi sgor mngon par phyogs par
T02D2637:219a-6: blta'o // de nas phyag rgya de rang gi gnas
T02D2637:219a-7: su bkrol te lcags kyu de sgo nyid la gtad
T02D2637:219a-8: blta'o // do // lho phyogs kyi sgor bltas la /
T02D2637:219a-9: rdo rje zhags pa'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2637:219a-10: der zhags pa bsams la 'gugs pa'i tshul gyis bde
T02D2637:219a-11: bar gshegs pa la sogs pa sems dpa' chen po
T02D2637:219a-12: thams cad rang rang gi sgor zhugs par brtags te
T02D2637:219a-13: / de'i snying po aom badzra p'a sha h'um /
T02D2637:219a-15: phyag rgya yang rang gi gnas nyid du dgrol lo //
T02D2637:219a-16: de'i 'og tu nub phyogs kyi sgor bltas la /
T02D2637:219a-17: rdo rje lcags sgrog pho nya'i las kyi phyag rgya bcings la /
T02D2637:219a-20: zhes bya ba yang brjod cing de dag ji srid 'dod par bzhugs par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2637:219a-21: ston pa'i bka' mtshan nyid rdo rje lcags sgrog gi
T02D2637:219a-22: sgrog tu gzhug / de yang rang gnas su bkrol
T02D2637:219a-23: bar bya'o // byang phyogs kyi sgor bltas te rdo
T02D2637:219a-24: rje dbab pa bran gyi phyag rgya bcings nas der
T02D2637:219a-25: yang shes rab kyi mtshan ma rdo rje dril bu
T02D2637:219a-26: bar bya'o // bsams te / aom badzra a'a be sha ho:/
T02D2637:219a-28: dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul gyis de rnams mnyes par
T02D2637:219a-29: byas te phyag rgya rang gi gnas su dgrol lo
T02D2637:219a-30: // rang gi khas blangs pa'i tshig kyang brjod do //
T02D2637:219a-32: sgo rnams kyang ni thams cad du //
T02D2637:219a-33: lcags kyu la sogs las byas nas //
T02D2637:219a-35: de sngon du sgo dbye ba yang la 'dod do //
T02D2637:219a-36: bdag nyid chen po gang gang gis //
T02D2637:219a-37: phyag rgyas gang dang gang bcings pa //
T02D2637:219a-38: bzlas pa'i snying po'i don du ni //
T02D2637:219a-39: der ni bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2637:219a-40: dam tshig gi phyag rgya thams cad las rgyal ba la sa ma ya stvam /
T02D2637:219a-42: de ni phyag rgya bcing pa'i snying po yin pas
T02D2637:219a-43: phyag rgya bca' ba'i rigs kun la yang mi 'gal
T02D2637:219a-44: lo // de nas las kyi phyag rgya lha thams
T02D2637:219a-45: cad kyi bkas gzhug pa'i sa nas so so'i gnas
T02D2637:219b-0: su gzhug pa bstim pa ste gnyis @219b su med
T02D2637:219b-1: lo // par bya'o // de yang sngags kyi rgyud las /
T02D2637:219b-2: las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis //
T02D2637:219b-3: dam tshig rnams ni gzhag bar bgyi //
T02D2637:219b-5: de'i don ni lha so so'i las kyi phyag rgya
T02D2637:219b-6: bcas te so so'i snying po brjod la gnas su
T02D2637:219b-7: bstim mo // snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2637:219b-8: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas gnyis su med pa de la yun ring du bsam gtan bya'o //
T02D2637:219b-10: dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2637:219b-11: sems ma rdo rje la sogs pas //
T02D2637:219b-12: de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub //
T02D2637:219b-14: de'i don snying gar sems ma rdo rje bsams la
T02D2637:219b-15: lha so so'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la
T02D2637:219b-16: so so'i sngags kyi mjug la sa ma ya stvam
T02D2637:219b-17: / sa ma ya ho a'a h'um /
T02D2637:219b-18: zhes brjod la rdo rje'i lta bas yun ring du bsam gtan bya'o //
T02D2637:219b-19: sngags shin tu gsal ba de la lha so so'i
T02D2637:219b-20: lce la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i dbus su chos
T02D2637:219b-22: so so'i chos kyi phyag rgya brjod do //
T02D2637:219b-23: phyag rgya chen po gong du bsam pa'o //
T02D2637:219b-24: de ltar phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par byas nas bde bar gshegs pas bdag byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D2637:219b-25: aom sho dha ne sho dha ne sarba p'a pam aa na ya h'um /
T02D2637:219b-27: aom sarba bit sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ne h'um phat /
T02D2637:219b-28: sdig pa thams cad dag par byed pa'i sngags so //
T02D2637:219b-29: aom sarba bit tra ta h'um phat /
T02D2637:219b-30: ngan song thams cad dag par byed pa'o //
T02D2637:219b-53: aom badzra a'a lo ke hri /
T02D2637:219b-55: aom badzra aa dku sha dza:/
T02D2637:219b-58: aom badzra a'a be sha aa /
T02D2637:219b-59: aom badzra sarba sam sk'a ra pa ri sho dha
T02D2637:219b-60: ya ma h'a ya na pa ri b'a re sv'a
T02D2637:219b-61: h'a / de ni sngags rnams so //
T02D2637:220a-1: la sogs pa nas kun du bzang po mthar thug pa ni rig pa des bya'o //
T02D2637:220a-2: yang na bshad pa'o rgyud las 'byung ba so so'i sngags kyis bya'o //
T02D2637:220a-3: bshad pa'i rgyud las 'byung ba'i tshig 'di dag brjod do //
T02D2637:220a-4: mnyam nyid chos sku chen po la //
T02D2637:220a-5: sems can don phyir longs spyod rdzogs//
T02D2637:220a-6: thugs rjes sprul skur gshegs nas kyang //
T02D2637:220a-7: sems can dgongs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2637:220a-8: so so'i gnas su phyag rgyas gzhug / phyag rgya dang ni snying po brjod //
T02D2637:220a-10: sems can don phyir gtso bo'i gzugs //
T02D2637:220a-11: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams //
T02D2637:220a-12: sngon gyi thugs dam rjes dgongs te ;
T02D2637:220a-13: / dgos pa bsgrub phyir brtan par bzhugs //
T02D2637:220a-15: phyag rgya bca' la snying po brjod //
T02D2637:220a-16: sems can dang phyir sku sprul pa //
T02D2637:220a-17: rgyal sras 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
T02D2637:220a-18: rgyal ba grangs dang gsungs pa'o //
T02D2637:220a-19: gsungs pa'i don rnams bshad du gsol //
T02D2637:220a-21: byams pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni /
T02D2637:220a-22: sku dang las dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ldan pa ni phyag rgya'o //
T02D2637:220a-23: las kyi phyag rgya ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya med pa'o //
T02D2637:220a-24: dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang /
T02D2637:220a-25: rdo rje rtse nyi shu pa'o //
T02D2637:220a-26: yang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur g-yas pa'i mtheb mdzub kyis phye ba'o //
T02D2637:220a-27: chos kyi phyag rgya ni gong gi rig pa'o //
T02D2637:220a-28: brjod pa chos kyi phyag rgya dang //
T02D2637:220a-29: bsam pa chos kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2637:220a-30: bsam pa dang bcas pa las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2637:220a-31: bsam pa dang bcing ba dang gzung ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //

T02D2637:220a-33: phyag rgya bzhi dang bral ba ni //
T02D2637:220a-34: ldan na dgos pa thams cad 'grub //
T02D2637:220a-35: rnal 'byor pa la dngos grub med //
T02D2637:220a-36: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis gsungs //
T02D2637:220a-37: de bas na 'jig rten pa la yang sku dang
T02D2637:220a-38: gsung dang thugs dang las dang rim pas sbyar ro
T02D2637:220a-39: // kun kyang phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02D2637:220a-40: sku phyag rgya chen po de nas mchod ba bya ste /
T02D2637:220a-41: de yang de dag gi mdun du sdom pa blangs te de yang //
T02D2637:220a-42: ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams //
T02D2637:220a-44: sems can mya ngan las 'das dgod //
T02D2637:220a-45: ces bya ba'i bar du brjod /
T02D2637:220b-0: de nas rang gi lha'i ting nge @220b 'dzin dang ldan pas mchod pa byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2637:220b-1: gtso bo'i sngags dang sarba ka ri gang yang rung ba gdags par bya'o //
T02D2637:220b-2: de nas lha so so'i las mu dra phyag rgya dang ldan pas so so'i sngags bzlas so //
T02D2637:220b-3: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i sngags mang du bzlas te bsang dag par bya'o //
T02D2637:220b-4: de nas mchod pa yang dri chus zhabs bsil dbul /
T02D2637:220b-5: 'o ma dang mngar bsres pas zhal bsil /
T02D2637:220b-6: chu gtsang ma 'ba' zhig gis 'thor 'thung bya /
T02D2637:220b-7: de nas me tog dkar po g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mos blangs la gzhan brkyang la dbul /
T02D2637:220b-8: aom ni ri ti kham sv'a h'a /
T02D2637:220b-9: zhes pa gong ma'i sngags so //
T02D2637:220b-10: aom sarba sam sho dha ni h'um /
T02D2637:220b-12: de nas mchod yon gyi snod nas /
T02D2637:220b-13: aom bee ro tsa na aargham pra t'itstsha ho //
T02D2637:220b-15: de nas spos la sogs pa bzhi zhes bskyed de /
T02D2637:220b-16: rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa la so so'am sbyir dbul lo //
T02D2637:220b-17: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta dh'a pe p'u dza
T02D2637:220b-18: mi gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma
T02D2637:220b-19: ye h'um / zhes pa dang spos kyis so //
T02D2637:220b-20: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pushpe p'u dza mi
T02D2637:220b-21: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2637:220b-22: h'um / zhes bya ba dang me tog gis so //
T02D2637:220b-23: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a lo ke p'u
T02D2637:220b-24: dza me gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa
T02D2637:220b-25: ma ye h'um / zhes bya ba dang mar mes so //
T02D2637:220b-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta gandhe p'u dza me
T02D2637:220b-27: gha sa mu dra spha ra na sa ma ye
T02D2637:220b-28: h'um / zhes bya ba dang dris so //
T02D2637:220b-29: bdag gi slob dpon rtsa ba'i rgyud ltar bya bar gsungs so //
T02D2637:220b-30: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharma n'am a'a dya nutpanna tv'a ta /
T02D2637:220b-31: ces bya ba dang bshos kyis so //
T02D2637:220b-32: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod do //
T02D2637:220b-33: yang na lha thams cad la bstod pa so sos bstod do //
T02D2637:220b-34: nus na mchod pa bcu drug pos mchod /

T02D2637:220b-36: 'di ltar shar phyogs nas rdo rje thal mo brkyang la lus thams cad phab ste /
T02D2637:220b-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dzo pa stha na ya a'atma nam ni ry'i ta y'a mi /
T02D2637:220b-38: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa tva aa dhi tishthi sva m'am /
T02D2637:220b-40: de nas lho phyogs nas ji skad bshad pa'i rdo
T02D2637:220b-41: rje thal mo snying gar sbyar te dpral bsal reg
T02D2637:220b-42: par byas la / aom sarba ta th'a ga ta
T02D2637:220b-43: p'u dza aa bhi she ka ya a'atma nam ni
T02D2637:221a-0: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra ratna ae bhi shinytsa m'am @221a * //

T02D2637:227b-10: par gdab bo // de yang rgyud las /
T02D2637:227b-11: de nas thal bar gyur pa dang //
T02D2637:227b-12: rdo rje bsdu ba'i sngags kyis su //
T02D2637:227b-13: cho ga bzhin du bsdu bar bya //
T02D2637:227b-14: thal ba de yang dul ba'i rdul //
T02D2637:227b-15: sngags kyis btab pa'i dri chu dang //
T02D2637:227b-16: ba skyes 'o ma la sogs lngas //
T02D2637:227b-17: sbyong ba'i sngags kyis blo ldan gyis //
T02D2637:227b-18: 'bum du bzlas pa rdzogs nas ni //
T02D2637:227b-19: ga bur dri yis bsgos pa yis //
T02D2637:227b-20: 'jim pa dang ni bsres nas kyang //
T02D2637:227b-21: gzugs su byas pa'am yang na ni //
T02D2637:227b-22: mchod rten gyi ni ltar byas la //
T02D2637:227b-23: gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam lnga //
T02D2637:227b-24: yang na brgya rtsa brgyad du bya //
T02D2637:227b-25: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs te de yang shi
T02D2637:227b-26: ba'i don du ngan song las thar bar bya ba'i
T02D2637:227b-27: thabs rgyud las bstan par shes par bya'o //
T02D2637:227b-28: gong ma ltar byas pa'i yon tan yang rgyud las /
T02D2637:227b-29: de lta na ni sdig can yang //
T02D2637:227b-30: ngan song las ni thar bar 'gyur //
T02D2637:227b-31: dge ba'i chos ni bsdu ba dang //
T02D2637:227b-32: byang chub sa bon bskyed pa dang //
T02D2637:227b-33: sangs rgyas 'bras bu rgyu dang ldan //
T02D2637:227b-34: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par ldan //
T02D2637:227b-35: tshul khrims rgyud dang rab ldan pa //
T02D2637:227b-36: bzod pa brtson 'grus phyin bzhag dang //
T02D2637:227b-37: shes rab rnams kyi rgyur sgom pa'o //
T02D2637:227b-38: 'jig rten bsod nams lta ci smos //
T02D2637:227b-39: myur du ngan song the tshom ni //
T02D2637:227b-40: bcom par 'gyur te the tshom med //
T02D2637:227b-41: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2637:227b-42: de nas aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya nutpanna tv'ata ;
T02D2637:227b-43: ces zlos shing dkyil 'khor phyis la /
T02D2637:227b-44: dman ma la sogs pa chur dor bar bya'o //
T02D2637:227b-45: de nas phur pa yang gdon //
T02D2637:227b-46: de nas ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddha
T02D2637:227b-47: lo tsa na sarba aartha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a
T02D2637:227b-48: / brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i 'o mas phur bu
T02D2637:227b-49: dang gzugs brnyan thams cad bkru bar bya zhing khang
T02D2637:228a-1: dkyil 'khor cho ga byas pa las //
T02D2637:228a-2: bdag gis dge ba gang bsags de'i //
T02D2637:228a-3: bde ba gnyis med dam pa de //
T02D2637:228a-4: 'jig rten kun gyis rtogs par shog /'phags pa rdo
T02D2637:228a-5: rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud las btus pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2637:228a-6: gyi cho ga slob dpon dharma k'irtis mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D2637:228a-8: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a'a ts'arya dharma p'a
T02D2637:228a-9: la dang zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong
